019package org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n;
020
021import static java.lang.System.setProperty;
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.INTERNAL;
024import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
025import static org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.TextUse.STRING;
026import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.ISO8859_1;
027import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.CommonConstants.PROPERTY_RESOURCEBUNDLE_ENCODING;
028import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.DebugOutput.debugOutput;
029import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
030import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
031import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;
032import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.isNotEmptyOrBlank;
033
034import java.util.MissingResourceException;
035import java.util.Optional;
036import java.util.ResourceBundle;
037
038import org.apiguardian.api.API;
039import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
040import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.UtilityClass;
041import org.tquadrat.foundation.exception.PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError;
042import org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects;
043
044/**
045 *  Utilities that are related to the i18n feature.
046 *
047 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
048 *  @version $Id: I18nUtil.java 992 2022-01-16 19:51:31Z tquadrat $
049 *  @since 0.1.0
050 *
051 *  @UMLGraph.link
052 */
053@UtilityClass
054@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: I18nUtil.java 992 2022-01-16 19:51:31Z tquadrat $" )
055@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
056public final class I18nUtil
057{
058        /*-----------*\
059    ====** Constants **========================================================
060        \*-----------*/
061    /**
062     *  The name for the file with the additional texts: {@value}.
063     */
064    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
065    public static final String ADDITIONAL_TEXT_FILE = "AdditionalTexts.xml";
066
067    /**
068     *  The name of the annotation processor option that provides the location
069     *  for the file with the additional texts
070     *  ({@value org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.I18nUtil#ADDITIONAL_TEXT_FILE}):
071     *  {@value}.
072     */
073    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
074    public static final String ADDITIONAL_TEXT_LOCATION = "org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.ap.textLocation";
075
076    /**
077     *  The default name for the resource bundle: {@value}.
078     */
079    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
080    public static final String DEFAULT_BASEBUNDLENAME = "MessagesAndTexts";
081
082    /**
083     *  The default message prefix: {@value}.
084     */
085    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
086    public static final String DEFAULT_MESSAGE_PREFIX = "MSG";
087
088        /*--------------*\
089    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
090        \*--------------*/
091    /**
092     *  No instance allowed for this class.
093     */
094    private I18nUtil() { throw new PrivateConstructorForStaticClassCalledError( I18nUtil.class ); }
095
096        /*---------*\
097    ====** Methods **==========================================================
098        \*---------*/
099    /**
100     *  <p>{@summary Composes a message key.}</p>
101     *  <p>The format for the key is like this</p>
102     *  <pre><code>&lt;<i>message_prefix</i>&gt;-&lt;<i>id</i>&gt;</code></pre>
103     *
104     *  @param  messagePrefix   The message prefix.
105     *  @param  id  The message id.
106     *  @return The message key.
107     */
108    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
109    public static final String composeMessageKey( final String messagePrefix, final String id )
110    {
111        final var retValue = format( "%s-%s", requireNotEmptyArgument( messagePrefix, "messagePrefix" ), requireNotEmptyArgument( id, "id" ) );
112
113        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
114        return retValue;
115    }   //  composeMessageKey()
116
117    /**
118     *  <p>{@summary Composes a message key.}</p>
119     *  <p>The format for the key is like this</p>
120     *  <pre><code>&lt;<i>message_prefix</i>&gt;-&lt;<i>id</i>&gt;</code></pre>
121     *  <p>The id will be a six-digit number, prepended with zeroes if
122     *  required.</p>
123     *
124     *  @param  messagePrefix   The message prefix.
125     *  @param  id  The message id.
126     *  @return The message key.
127     */
128    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
129    public static final String composeMessageKey( final String messagePrefix, final int id )
130    {
131        final var retValue = format( "%s-%06d", requireNotEmptyArgument( messagePrefix, "messagePrefix" ), id );
132
133        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
134        return retValue;
135    }   //  composeMessageKey()
136
137    /**
138     *  <p>{@summary Composes the resource bundle key for a text.}</p>
139     *  <p>The format for the key is like this:</p>
140     *  <pre><code>&lt;<i>class_name</i>&gt;.&lt;<i>use</i>&gt;_&lt;<i>id</i>&gt;</code></pre>
141     *
142     *  @param  sourceClass The class where the text was defined.
143     *  @param  use The text use.
144     *  @param  id  The id for the text, as from
145     *      {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Text#id() &#64;Text.id}.
146     *  @return The text key.
147     */
148    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
149    public static final String composeTextKey( final Class<?> sourceClass, final TextUse use, final String id )
150    {
151        final var retValue = composeTextKey( requireNonNullArgument( sourceClass, "sourceClass" ).getName(), use, id );
152
153        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
154        return retValue;
155    }   //  composeTextKey()
156
157    /**
158     *  <p>{@summary Composes the resource bundle key for a text.}</p>
159     *  <p>The format for the key is like this:</p>
160     *  <pre><code>&lt;<i>class_name</i>&gt;.&lt;<i>use</i>&gt;_&lt;<i>id</i>&gt;</code></pre>
161     *
162     *  @param  sourceClass The name of the class where the text was defined.
163     *  @param  use The text use.
164     *  @param  id  The id for the text, as from
165     *      {@link org.tquadrat.foundation.i18n.Text#id() &#64;Text.id}.
166     *  @return The text key.
167     */
168    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
169    public static final String composeTextKey( final String sourceClass, final TextUse use, final String id )
170    {
171        final var retValue = format( "%s.%s_%s", requireNotEmptyArgument( sourceClass, "sourceClass" ), requireNonNullArgument( use, "use" ).name(), requireNotEmptyArgument( id, "name" ) );
172
173        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
174        return retValue;
175    }   //  composeTextKey()
176
177    /**
178     *  <p>{@summary Composes the resource bundle key for an <code>enum</code>
179     *  value.}</p>
180     *  <p>The format for the key is like this:</p>
181     *  <pre><code>&lt;<i>class_name</i>&gt;.STRING_&lt;<i>name</i>&gt;</code></pre>
182     *
183     *  @param  <E> The type of the {@code enum} value.
184     *  @param  value   The {@code enum} value.
185     *  @return The text key.
186     *
187     *  @see Enum#name()
188     */
189    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
190    public static final <E extends Enum<?>> String composeTextKey( final E value )
191    {
192        final var sourceClass = requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ).getDeclaringClass();
193        final var id = value.name();
194        final var use = STRING;
195        final var retValue = composeTextKey( sourceClass, use, id );
196
197        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
198        return retValue;
199    }   //  composeTextKey()
200
201    /**
202     *  Creates the fallback text or message when the resource bundle does not
203     *  have a text for the given key.
204     *
205     *  @param  key The failed key.
206     *  @param  args    The arguments.
207     *  @return The fallback text.
208     */
209    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
210    public static final String createFallback( final String key, final Object... args )
211    {
212        final var retValue = format( "[%s] – %s", requireNotEmptyArgument( key, "key" ), Objects.toString( args ) );
213
214        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
215        return retValue;
216    }   //  createFallback()
217
218    /**
219     *  Loads the resource bundle with the given base bundle name. If there is
220     *  no resource bundle for the given base bundle name, the return value is
221     *  {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty}.
222     *
223     *  @param  baseBundleName  The base bundle name.
224     *  @return An instance of
225     *      {@link Optional}
226     *      that holds the resource bundle.
227     */
228    @SuppressWarnings( "AssignmentToNull" )
229    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
230    public static final Optional<ResourceBundle> loadResourceBundle( final String baseBundleName )
231    {
232        //---* Force the use of UTF-8 for the resource bundle files *----------
233        setProperty( PROPERTY_RESOURCEBUNDLE_ENCODING, ISO8859_1.name() );
234
235        ResourceBundle bundle;
236        try
237        {
238            final var bundleName = requireNotEmptyArgument( baseBundleName, "baseBundleName" );
239            bundle = ResourceBundle.getBundle( bundleName );
240        }
241        catch( final MissingResourceException e )
242        {
243            debugOutput( e );
244            bundle = null;
245        }
246
247        final var retValue = Optional.ofNullable( bundle );
248
249        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
250        return retValue;
251    }   //  loadResourceBundle()
252
253    /**
254     *  Returns the message for the given key, or the alternative text.
255     *
256     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
257     *  @param  message The message.
258     *  @param  messageKey  The resource bundle key for the alternative
259     *      message.
260     *  @param  args    The argument for the alternative message.
261     *  @return The resolved message.
262     *
263     *  @deprecated Use
264     *      {@link #resolveText(Optional, String, String, Object...)}
265     *      instead.
266     */
267    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "BoundedWildcard"} )
268    @Deprecated( forRemoval = true, since = "0.0.2" )
269    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.2" )
270    public static final String resolveMessage( final Optional<ResourceBundle> bundle, final String message, final String messageKey, final Object... args )
271    {
272        final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( bundle, "bundle" ).isPresent() && isNotEmptyOrBlank( messageKey )
273            ? retrieveText( bundle.get(), messageKey, args )
274            : requireNotEmptyArgument( message, "message" );
275
276        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
277        return retValue;
278    }   //  resolveMessage()
279
280    /**
281     *  Returns the message for the given key, or the alternative text.
282     *
283     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
284     *  @param  message The message.
285     *  @param  messageKey  The resource bundle key for the alternative
286     *      message.
287     *  @param  args    The argument for the alternative message.
288     *  @return The resolved message.
289     *
290     *  @deprecated Use
291     *      {@link #resolveText(Optional, Optional, Optional, Object...)}
292     *      instead.
293     */
294    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
295    @Deprecated( forRemoval = true, since = "0.0.2" )
296    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.2" )
297    public static final String resolveMessage( final Optional<ResourceBundle> bundle, final Optional<String> message, final Optional<String> messageKey, final Object... args )
298    {
299        final var _message = requireNonNullArgument( message, "message" ).orElse( "[MissingMessage] – %s" );
300        final var _messageKey = requireNonNullArgument( messageKey, "messageKey" ).orElse( "MissingMessage" );
301        final var retValue = resolveMessage( bundle, _message, _messageKey, args );
302
303        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
304        return retValue;
305    }   //  resolveMessage()
306
307    /**
308     *  <p>{@summary Returns the Text for the given key, or the alternative
309     *  text.} This method is primarily used internally by the library, but can
310     *  be also useful in other scenarios where the presence of a
311     *  {@link ResourceBundle}
312     *  is not guaranteed.</p>
313     *  <p>If there is a resource bundle,
314     *  {@link #retrieveText(ResourceBundle, String, Object...)}
315     *  should be used instead.</p>
316     *
317     *  @note   <code>text</code> is used as is! The arguments will be applied
318     *      only to a text that will be retrieved from the resource bundle!
319     *
320     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
321     *  @param  text    The alternative text that is used if there is no
322     *      resource bundle, or that bundle does not contain a text for the
323     *      given key.
324     *  @param  textKey The resource bundle key for the text.
325     *  @param  args    The argument for the retrieved text.
326     *  @return The resolved text.
327     */
328    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "BoundedWildcard"} )
329    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
330    public static final String resolveText( final Optional<ResourceBundle> bundle, final String text, final String textKey, final Object... args )
331    {
332        final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( bundle, "bundle" ).isPresent() && isNotEmptyOrBlank( textKey )
333            ? retrieveText( bundle.get(), textKey, args )
334            : requireNotEmptyArgument( text, "text" );
335
336        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
337        return retValue;
338    }   //  resolveText()
339
340    /**
341     *  <p>{@summary Returns the Text for the given key, or the alternative
342     *  text.} This method is primarily used internally by the library, but can
343     *  be also useful in other scenarios where the presence of a
344     *  {@link ResourceBundle}
345     *  is not guaranteed.</p>
346     *  <p>If there is a resource bundle,
347     *  {@link #retrieveText(ResourceBundle, String, Object...)}
348     *  should be used instead.</p>
349     *
350     *  @note   <code>text</code> is used as is! The arguments will be applied
351     *      only to a text that will be retrieved from the resource bundle!
352     *
353     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
354     *  @param  text    The alternative text that is used if there is no
355     *      resource bundle, or that bundle does not contain a text for the
356     *      given key.
357     *  @param  textKey The resource bundle key for the text.
358     *  @param  args    The argument for the retrieved text.
359     *  @return The resolved text.
360     */
361    @SuppressWarnings( "OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType" )
362    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
363    public static final String resolveText( final Optional<ResourceBundle> bundle, final Optional<String> text, final Optional<String> textKey, final Object... args )
364    {
365        final var _message = requireNonNullArgument( text, "text" ).orElse( createFallback( "MissingText", args ) );
366        final var _messageKey = requireNonNullArgument( textKey, "textKey" ).orElse( "MissingTextKey" );
367        final var retValue = resolveText( bundle, _message, _messageKey, args );
368
369        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
370        return retValue;
371    }   //  resolveText()
372
373    /**
374     *  <p>{@summary Returns the Text for the given {@code enum} value.} This
375     *  method is primarily used internally by the library, but can be also
376     *  useful in other scenarios where the presence of a
377     *  {@link ResourceBundle}
378     *  is not guaranteed.</p>
379     *  <p>If there is a resource bundle,
380     *  {@link #retrieveText(ResourceBundle, Enum)}
381     *  should be used instead.</p>
382     *
383     *  @param  <E> The type of the {@code enum} value.
384     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
385     *  @param  value   The {@code enum} value.
386     *  @return The resolved text.
387     */
388    @SuppressWarnings( {"OptionalUsedAsFieldOrParameterType", "BoundedWildcard"} )
389    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.1.0" )
390    public static final <E extends Enum<?>> String resolveText( final Optional<ResourceBundle> bundle, final E value )
391    {
392        final var retValue = requireNonNullArgument( bundle, "bundle" ).isPresent()
393             ? retrieveText( bundle.get(), value )
394             : requireNotEmptyArgument( value, "value" ).name();
395
396        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
397        return retValue;
398    }   //  resolveText()
399
400    /**
401     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves the message with the given key from the given
402     *  resource bundle and applies the given arguments to it.}</p>
403     *  <p>If the resource bundle does not contain a message for the given key,
404     *  the key itself will be returned, appended with the arguments.</p>
405     *
406     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
407     *  @param  messagePrefix   The message prefix.
408     *  @param  id  The id for the message.
409     *  @param  addKey  The recommended value is {@code true}; this means that
410     *      the message will be prefixed with the generated message key.
411     *  @param  args    The arguments for the message.
412     *  @return The text.
413     */
414    public static final String retrieveMessage( final ResourceBundle bundle, final String messagePrefix, final int id, final boolean addKey, final Object... args )
415    {
416        final var retValue = retrieveMessage( bundle, composeMessageKey( messagePrefix, id ), addKey, args );
417
418        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
419        return retValue;
420    }   //  retrieveMessage()
421
422    /**
423     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves the message with the given key from the given
424     *  resource bundle and applies the given arguments to it.}</p>
425     *  <p>If the resource bundle does not contain a message for the given key,
426     *  the key itself will be returned, appended with the arguments.</p>
427     *
428     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
429     *  @param  messagePrefix   The message prefix.
430     *  @param  id  The id for the message.
431     *  @param  addKey  The recommended value is {@code true}; this means that
432     *      the message will be prefixed with the generated message key.
433     *  @param  args    The arguments for the message.
434     *  @return The text.
435     *
436     *  @see Objects#toString(Object)
437     */
438    public static final String retrieveMessage( final ResourceBundle bundle, final String messagePrefix, final String id, final boolean addKey, final Object... args )
439    {
440        final var retValue = retrieveMessage( bundle, composeMessageKey( messagePrefix, id ), addKey, args );
441
442        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
443        return retValue;
444    }   //  retrieveMessage()
445
446    /**
447     *  The internal implementation for
448     *  {@link #retrieveMessage(ResourceBundle, String, int, boolean, Object...)}
449     *  and
450     *  {@link #retrieveMessage(ResourceBundle, String, String, boolean, Object...)}.
451     *
452     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
453     *  @param  key The key for the message.
454     *  @param  addKey  The recommended value is {@code true}; this means that
455     *      the message will be prefixed with the generated message key.
456     *  @param  args    The arguments for the message.
457     *  @return The text.
458     */
459    @API( status = INTERNAL, since = "0.1.0", consumers = "retrieveMessage()" )
460    private static final String retrieveMessage( final ResourceBundle bundle, final String key, final boolean addKey, final Object... args )
461    {
462        final var message = retrieveText( bundle, key, args );
463        final var retValue = addKey
464             ? format( "[%s] %s", key, message )
465             : message;
466
467        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
468        return retValue;
469    }   //  retrieveMessage()
470
471    /**
472     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves the text with the given key from the given
473     *  resource bundle and applies the given arguments to it.}</p>
474     *  <p>If the resource bundle does not contain a text for the given key,
475     *  the key itself will be returned, appended with the arguments.</p>
476     *
477     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
478     *  @param  key The key for the text.
479     *  @param  args    The arguments for the text.
480     *  @return The text.
481     *
482     *  @see Objects#toString(Object)
483     */
484    public static final String retrieveText( final ResourceBundle bundle, final String key, final Object... args )
485    {
486        requireNonNullArgument( args, "args" );
487        String retValue;
488        try
489        {
490            final var format = requireNonNullArgument( bundle, "bundle" ).getString( requireNotEmptyArgument( key, "key" ) );
491            retValue = format( format, args ).translateEscapes();
492        }
493        catch( @SuppressWarnings( "unused" ) final MissingResourceException e )
494        {
495            retValue = createFallback( key, args );
496        }
497
498        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
499        return retValue;
500    }   //  retrieveText()
501
502    /**
503     *  <p>{@summary Retrieves the text for the given {@code enum} value from
504     *  the given resource bundle.}</p>
505     *  <p>If the resource bundle does not contain a text for the {@code enum},
506     *  the text key for it will be returned.</p>
507     *
508     *  @param  <E> The type of the {@code enum} value.
509     *  @param  bundle  The resource bundle.
510     *  @param  value   The {@code enum} value.
511     *  @return The text.
512     */
513    public static final <E extends Enum<?>> String retrieveText( final ResourceBundle bundle, final E value )
514    {
515        final var retValue = retrieveText( bundle, composeTextKey( requireNonNullArgument( value, "value" ) ) );
516
517        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
518        return retValue;
519    }   //  retrieveText()
520}
521//  class I18nUtil
522
523/*
524 *  End of File
525 */
